notesStmt.note: Strophe endings denoted by a punctus; incomplete vocalization; A. The fragment opens with the last 10 strophes (מ-ת) of the Yotser ארבעים ושמונה בריתות. The verses of biblical content mix the themes of the Torah portion with that of the Haftorah, Isaiah LXI. Some of the strophes are incatenated. A complete version is found in Cambridge T-S 8H 20.4, the acrostic signature there is א-ת שמואל; A nearly complete copy is found above, 289 (Davidson, TMHP 1087ל).
